channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟢 14:39 Driven the alarm to Donetsk region. Since further messages.
item.description: 🟢 14:39 Driven the alarm to Donetsk region. Since further messages.#Donetsk This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
